tool_description: Calculates price elasticity of demand to understand how price changes affect sales volume and revenue.
error_messages: Product not found: The specified product ID does not exist in the database.
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 datetime strings.
Insufficient price variation: Product must have at least 3 price changes during the analysis period for reliable elasticity calculation.
Insufficient sales data: Not enough sales transactions found for the product in the specified period.
usage: Provide product_id and date range for analysis. Ensure the product had multiple price changes during the period for accurate elasticity measurement.

elasticity_category.description: Classification as elastic, inelastic, or unit elastic

confidence_level.description: Statistical confidence level of the calculation

price_changes_analyzed.description: Number of price changes included in calculation
